title: Deploy to Sepolia testnet
description: Deploy SolverRegistry and IntentReceiptHub to Sepolia testnet for integration testing with external partners and solvers.
close_reason: Deployed to Sepolia. Contracts: SolverRegistry=0xB6ab964832808E49635fF82D1996D6a888ecB745, IntentReceiptHub=0xD66A1e880AA3939CA066a9EA1dD37ad3d01D977c, DisputeModule=0x144DfEcB57B08471e2A75E78fc0d2A74A89DB79D. All authorizations configured. See deployments/sepolia.json

title: Partnership outreach - 1inch

title: Security audit #2
description: Second security audit covering new integrations and cross-chain features

title: Add challenger bond for griefing protection
description: Implement challenger bond requirement (10-25% of dispute value) to prevent malicious actors from locking solver bonds indefinitely via frivolous disputes. This is a critical security fix identified in the feasibility assessment.
close_reason: Implemented challenger bond requirement: 10% bond to open dispute, refund+reward on success, forfeit on failure. 67 tests passing. Commit 2bfc045

title: EigenLayer AVS deployment
description: Deploy IRSB as EigenLayer Actively Validated Service for restaking security

title: Partnership outreach - Across Protocol
description: Reach out to Across team proposing cross-chain receipt attestation pilot with 5 relayers. Emphasize lower user dispute rates + higher trust.
close_reason: Outreach materials complete: Initial email, technical integration brief, LOI template. File: outreach/across-outreach.md

title: Across Protocol integration
description: Integrate IRSB with Across Protocol bridge for cross-chain intent accountability

title: $100M monthly volume milestone
description: Scale to $100M monthly transaction volume

title: Accountability Gap Report - Dune Analytics
description: Create Dune Analytics query for CoWSwap intent failures, categorize by type (timeout, MinOut violation, MEV extraction, non-delivery), and produce a 3-page PDF with dollar value at risk per month and solver breakdown
close_reason: Created 004-MR-RSCH-accountability-gap-report.md documenting K+ solver losses, CIP-22/CIP-55 incidents, systemic issues (DAO bottleneck, no receipts, no cross-protocol reputation), and IRSB solution. Ready for outreach.

title: Solver Reputation Dashboard
description: Build public dashboard using The Graph + Next.js + Vercel showing solver performance metrics (IntentScore, fill rate, avg speed, slashing events) from on-chain data
close_reason: Dashboard complete: Next.js 14 + TypeScript + Tailwind. Build passes, dev server runs on localhost:3001. Files: page.tsx, SolverTable.tsx, StatsCards.tsx, solverData.ts. Demo data with 7 solvers, IntentScore calculation, contract links to Sepolia.

title: Phase 4: Expansion (Q4 2026)
description: Multi-chain expansion, enterprise compliance, insurance partnerships, $500M volume

title: Cache high-value evidence proofs on-chain
description: IPFS/Arweave evidence data could disappear. Implement on-chain caching for high-value dispute proofs to ensure evidence availability.

title: Lit Vincent Ability integration
description: Integrate Lit Protocol Vincent Ability for programmable intent policies

title: Implement reputation decay
description: Add time-weighted decay to IntentScore metrics so stale solvers don't retain old reputation scores indefinitely. Scores should decay over time if the solver is inactive.
close_reason: Implemented 30-day half-life decay with 10% floor. 74 tests passing. PR #2 created.

title: Implement DisputeModule for complex disputes
description: Create DisputeModule contract to handle non-deterministic dispute types (MinOutViolation, WrongToken, WrongChain, WrongRecipient) that require off-chain verification and arbitration.
close_reason: Complete: 21 tests passing, all dispute flows (evidence, escalation, arbitration, timeout resolution) implemented and verified. 95/95 tests pass across full suite.
